_sText:
Simple AIM Map where 2 players at a time (Picked randomly) respawn (One T, and one CT).  They are provided weapons (CT = M4a1, Deagle, HEGrenade ; T = AK47, Deagle, HEGrenade) There is one AWP on the map which is located smack dab in the middle.

As for the other players in the map, they sit at the top of the map and watch as the two battle it out. Which ever one survives uses the awp to kill the 7 remaining players in the "Stands" of the enemies side. Round restarts and new players are picked.

The objective : To elimate the other player and his team.

Respawn Points : 16 (8 CT's ; 8 T's)

Weapons on map : 7 (x1 M4a1 ; x1 AK47 ; x2 Deagle ; x2 HEGrenade ; x1 AWP)

This is the final version of the map. 
Do not tell me the water is messed up, it is like that intentionaly.
